snippet.title: Strange Telephone - Trailer
snippet.description:
Strange Telephone out now on Playism and Steam.
Playism: https://playism.com/product/strangetelephone
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/705290/

Strange Telephone delves into the multi-ending 2D adventure game, developed by HZ3 Software. Travel around a strange pixel world, automatically generated by a 6-digit phone number.

The protagonist Jill is trapped in a dark world with a large door floating before her. She is aided by Graham, who takes on the form of a telephone. Making phone calls with Graham creates various worlds that can be explored. In each of these worlds are items to be found, including the key that will lead to her escape.

Features:
- A unique and enticing adventure game.
- Fascinating pixel art, captivating music and carefully designed animation.
- A huge upgrade from the original game released on mobile.
- 11 different endings
- New stage designs, items and characters.
- Character introductions for everyone you meet.

Information:
Title: Strange Telephone
Genre: 2D Adventure
Price: $4.99
Release Date: Jan 21st, 2019
Languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
Publisher: PLAYISM 
Developer: HZ3 Software
